::Dark Prime::

    With that little taste of power he wanted more, he knew=
 that dark sparks would feed him more. He remembered hearing about the Alli=
ance, and how powerful it is. He decided it needed weakening, and with all =
his powers he could do it, but he needed help. He had seen something like a=
 bat flying around and decided to contact it's owner. Then he remembered th=
e Destrons, and maybe he could rally what was left of them to help him as w=
ell.
    "I will be back soon," He said to Ironhide. "Stay here and regener=
ate, that's an order."
    He left Nod and went off in search of the Destro=
ns.
